## Description {#details}

This file builds on the <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/graphtraits-h">ADT/GraphTraits.h</a> file to build a generic breadth first graph iterator.

This file exposes the following functions/types:

bf&#95;begin/bf&#95;end/bf&#95;iterator
<ul>
<li>Normal breadth-first iteration - visit a graph level-by-level.</li>
</ul>

<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ChildIt.emplace(GT::child&#95;begin(<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&#42;ChildIt != GT::child&#95;end(<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Already visited?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (this-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bf-iterator-storage/#a9a5756c186d0a5624e97066c3f46fbef">Visited</a>.insert(Next).second)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">        VisitQueue.push(QueueElement(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab13c360340346d082b959b8cd79f2c1a">Next</a>, std::nullopt));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">    VisitQueue.pop();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Go to the next element skipping markers if needed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!VisitQueue.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Head = VisitQueue.front();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Head != std::nullopt)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Level += 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">      VisitQueue.pop();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t push another marker if this is the last</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// element.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!VisitQueue.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">        VisitQueue.push(std::nullopt);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is a nonstandard operator-&gt; that dereferences the pointer an extra</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// time so that you can actually call methods on the node, because the</span></CodeLine>
